start: ^You and your enemy stand face-to-face. Tension fills the air as you both prepare to argue.
Walk: ^You Walk around the platform. Trying to catch the enemy
Run: ^You take a step back, trying to avoid further conflict. The enemy looks frustrated

c-1: ^Enemy: "You’re wasting time. Nothing’s going to change."
c-3: ^ "I can’t talk to you right now."

End: ^The argument continues, unresolved, and both of you are left to think about your next move.
